Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='HSK99B')

BibliographicData.Title: Prefrontal connections of the parabelt auditory cortex in macaque monkeys.

Reference.Comments: Figure with out borders and clear brain site names. The injected site was marked on the figure in dorso-ventral direction at the axis of auditory parabelt on STG. In rostro-caudal direction it was marked rostral to RTL. Thus I assume GP83-Ts2

The text and figure states the label in are 8A. But on the figure you can see that label has been found in area 8A only on the convexity, not in the arcuate sulcus. This is the region which PG91a describe to be 8Ar.
An exact reference to the brainsite is given in the companion paper HSK99a!!

The text and figure states the label in are 8A. But on the figure you can see that label has been found in area 8A only on the convexity, not in the arcuate sulcus. This is the region which PG91a describe to be 8Ar.

Because the tracers vary in sensitivity, the amounts and solution concentrations were varied accordingly (typically, 0.01 to 0.05 µl at 2% for WGA-HRP; 0.1 to 0.3 µl at 2 to 10% for BDA and fluorescent tracers).

The text and figure states the label in are 8A. But on the figure you can see that label has been found in area 8A only on the convexity, not in the arcuate sulcus. This is the region which PG91a describe to be 8Ar.

Because the tracers vary in sensitivity, the amounts and solution concentrations were varied accordingly (typically, 0.01 to 0.05 µl at 2% for WGA-HRP; 0.1 to 0.3 µl at 2 to 10% for BDA and fluorescent tracers).

The text and figure states the label in are 8A. But on the figure you can see that label has been found in area 8A only on the convexity, not in the arcuate sulcus. This is the region which PG91a describe to be 8Ar.

Figure with out borders and clear brain site names. The injected site was marked on the figure in dorso-ventral direction at the axis of auditory parabelt on STG. In rostro-caudal direction it was marked near the rostral end of STG. Thus I assume GP83-Ts1

The text and figure states the label in are 8A. But on the figure you can see that label has been found in area 8A only on the convexity, not in the arcuate sulcus. This is the region which PG91a describe to be 8Ar.
